SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_number() over (order by tempcolumn) temprownumber, * FROM ( SELECT TOP (#{pageNumber}*#{pageSize}) tempcolumn=0, a.user_id,a.value,a.old_value,a.new_value,a.add_time,a.order_no,a.type,a.remark,b.id as order_id from dt_user_amount_log a left join dt_orders b on a.order_no=b.order_no where a.user_id=#{user_id} and a.add_time>DateAdd(Month,-3,getdate()) order by a.add_time desc )vip)mvp where temprownumber>((#{pageNumber}-1)*#{pageSize})
select count(*) from dt_user_amount_log a left join dt_orders b on a.order_no=b.order_no where a.user_id=#{user_id} and a.add_time>DateAdd(Month,-3,getdate())

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT row_number() over (order by tempcolumn) temprownumber, * FROM ( SELECT TOP (#{pageNumber}*#{pageSize}) tempcolumn=0, o.id as order_id,isnull((select user_name from dt_users where id=o.user_id),'-') as buyer_name,isnull(o.payment_status,'-') payment_status, isnull((select user_name from dt_users where id=o.shop_user_id),'-') as shop_name, isnull((select mobile from dt_users where id=o.shop_user_id),'-') as mobile, isnull(o.order_no,'-') order_no,isnull(o.order_amount,0) order_amount,isnull(o.add_time,'') add_time,isnull(g.express_status,'-') express_status, isnull(o.status,'-') status,isnull(f.name,'-') name,isnull(o.book_back_status,'-') book_back_status from dt_orders o left join dt_users u on o.shop_user_id=u.id left join dt_order_goodinfo g on o.id=g.order_id left join dt_user_role_shopinfo f on o.shop_user_role_value=f.id and o.shop_user_role_type='Shop' where o.user_id=#{user_id} and o.add_time>DateAdd(Month,-3,getdate()) )vip)mvp where temprownumber>((#{pageNumber}-1)*#{pageSize})

select count(*) from dt_orders o left join dt_users u on o.shop_user_id=u.id left join dt_order_goodinfo g on o.id=g.order_id left join dt_user_role_shopinfo f on o.shop_user_role_value=f.id and o.shop_user_role_type='Shop' left join dt_order_backinfo b on o.id=b.order_id where o.user_id=#{user_id} and o.add_time>DateAdd(Month,-3,getdate())
select count(*) from dt_user_addr_book where user_id=#{user_id}

select a.reg_time,a.mobile,a.status,b.state,b.role_type, COALESCE(c.person_name,a.user_name) as name from dt_users a left join dt_user_accountinfo b on a.id=b.user_id and b.role_type='Buyer' left join dt_user_personinfo c on a.id=c.user_id where a.user_name=#{user_name}
select user_name from dt_users where id in (select user_id from dt_user_personinfo where person_name=#{person_name} union select user_id from dt_user_role_shopinfo where name=#{person_name})
